interaction.documentation: Communicate a MeasureReport with supplemental data in a Bundle using the [FHIR batch](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/http.html#transaction) operation. The MeasureReport shall be the first entry in the Bundle. Referenced MeasureReport.evaluatedResource elements shall appear as subsequent entries in the Bundle.

name: MeasureSource_ProduceMeasure_SupplementalData
title: Measure Source implementing the Produce Measure transaction with the Supplemental Data Option.
description: Defines the additional requirements for the Measure Source implementing the Produce Measure transaction with the Supplemental Data Option.
